item.title: 男与女
item.description: 看完电影，荧幕上还在滚动着制片人员名单，屏幕的光亮在房间里忽隐忽现地闪烁着，男与女，人类天生的欲望与家庭责任的龃龉，我在椅子上木然许久。

item.title: Have you ever been ‘Crying in H Mart’
item.description: 我开车疾驰，前往小镇购买临时应急用的香火。Radwimps的歌声盖住了我的抽泣，金色的阳光洒在空旷的乡间沥青大路上，迷糊了我的眼睛，两旁不记得是大片的绿色油菜还是金黄色的芦苇叶，随风摇曳。

item.title: Random Thoughts by the Sea
item.description: 冲澡和在海边发呆，恐怕是思绪涌永不断最频繁的两个时刻。

item.title: 生殖系统与男性特权
item.description: 实话说，如果让我不假思索脱口而出我所理解的女权的话，我的答案是：先天上，女性与男性在智力上没有区别；女性不是男性的附属品；女性不是一种资源。自不待言，我想这三条也是女权主义所公认的标语。

item.title: 尺度概念
item.description: 也不知道我的人生中出现过多少次“保守估计”与实际数值大相径庭的意外了。

item.title: This is Auckland
item.description: 《Pretend It’s a City》里，Martin问Fran为什么人们来纽约。Fran说：This is New York. 要问我为什么来奥克兰，我也会说： This is Auckland.

item.description: This article is mainly based on one blog of Pro. Yiqing Xu. As I just started my first job from last month, I think it is important to get some ideas about planning future life, especially in personal finance.

item.title: Review for 2020
item.description: 2020, people say this year will be written in history books. From Australia fire to pandemic, from Black Lives Matter to US political drama, worse events showed up one by one. For me, at the stage of 26 years old, these really make me rethink humanity and my life philosophy.

item.title: Chinese Cabbage-collapsing cabbage in Suzhou
item.description: Everyday Sunson Asian markets put baskets of “Chinese cabbage” at the entrance of the store. It should be the most consumable vegetable for Chinese. Why do the Chinese love these cabbage so much? Because it has a special bond, especially it is rooted in Wu (吴) culture.
